# `ConversationPushNotificationMessageLabel` Definition

A Push notification message label.

| Property | Type | Required | Description |
|----------|------|----------|-------------|
| title | `string` | Yes | Title to use in the push for each language configured in the deploymentId |
| body | `string` | Yes | Body to use in the push for each language configured in the deploymentId |
